events.title: Art Demonstration
events.subtitle:
You walk around the store, admiring all the materials that Danis has concocted to make his art. Various vials and containers are full of paints and powders, as well as shelves full of other things, like yarn, rocks, and clay. Orc Painting.text:

Cock Clay.text:
Danis the artist is working hard on an intricate clay vase. "It's for the mayor," he says. "I want to make sure it looks fitting enough to be displayed in his office. I'm trying to use the best materials."

While explaining this to you, Danis' hand slips and messes up the shape of his spinning creation, turning the nearly perfect vase into a crappy pile of clay. "Oh, clump!" Danis, while not happy, starts to gather all of the splattered clay back on his pottery wheel. "I'll have to get some more clay if I want to start over correctly."

He walks over to one of his closets, and when he opens it, a frightened, naked adventurer is revealed. events.title: Antipodal Painting
events.subtitle: A large painting catches your eye. It seems to depict an interplay between light and dark. [Enter Contributor Room 1]

success.text: You find yourself falling forward, hues swirling around you, as you are plunged into a painted world.
